item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Tuesday, March 18, 2025 at 10:20 AM UTC
item.description:
1. GIMP 3.0 Released (37 points | 16 comments)

3. Announcing Snix (38 points | 23 comments)
4. Can we consider self-promo discussion off-topic? (41 points | 24 comments)

8. Password reuse is rampant: nearly half of observed user logins are compromised (17 points | 22 comments)
9. Stop Using and Recommending React (5 points | 1 comment)
10. GPT-3.5 and the latest models (2 points | no comments)
11. Slack: The Art of Being Busy Without Getting Anything Done (3 points | 2 comments)
12. Introducing Intel® Advanced Performance Extensions (Intel® APX) (19 points | 5 comments)
13. After 47 years, OpenVMS gets a package manager (VSP) (6 points | 3 comments)
14. Offline PKI using 3 YubiKeys and an ARM single board computer (11 points | no comments)
15. Nginx Rejects Dark Mode Support For Error Pages (2 points | 1 comment)
16. Wherein I Explain Why Emacs Is The Best Tool For WordPress (15 points | no comments)
17. Installing the sassc Ruby gem on a Mac. A debugging story (14 points | no comments)
18. Extracting content from an LCP "protected" ePub (4 points | no comments)
19. Building a search engine from scratch (3 points | 1 comment)
20. Docs: Open-source collaborative notes, wiki, and documentation platform by the French government (143 points | 20 comments)
21. Tiny Pointers (12 points | 1 comment)
22. How to Track and Document Known Issues Effectively in Software Projects (1 points | no comments)
23. I built myself a watch (21 points | no comments)
24. Verifiability is the Limit (5 points | 4 comments)
25. The Calculated Typer (2 points | no comments)
